rows.label: qst002203_msg0001
rows.name:
What? You want to know about
Mellica?

rows.label: qst002203_msg0002
rows.name:
She joined the Choir of Acedia
recently, you know!

rows.label: qst002203_msg0003
rows.name:
She was the only one in this whole
camp who passed the audition.

rows.label: qst002203_msg0004
rows.name:
It's really prestigious to be
in the Choir. Only the very best
singers are allowed to join!

rows.label: qst002203_msg0005
rows.name:
When you're in the Choir, you get to
sing at official ceremonies, like when
they're moving the Divine Beast and stuff.

rows.label: qst002203_msg0006
rows.name:
Is that all you wanted?
See you around, then!
